Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes the New York city water board to grant a 10 percent discount on New York city water bills to senior citizens and veterans
Summary: Authorizes the New York city water board to grant a 10 percent discount on NYC water bills to senior citizens and veterans.
LawCode: Amd ยง1045-j, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing a discount for senior citizens and veterans in the city of New York for such persons' water bills
